proposedTasks.title: Investigate and fix all failing tests
proposedTasks.description: Run the full test suite (`npm test`), collect all failing test cases, diagnose root causes, and apply fixes. Acceptance criteria: (1) `npm test` exits with code 0 and all tests pass, (2) no tests are skipped or disabled to achieve a passing run, (3) each fix is minimal and does not alter intended behavior â€” if a test failure reveals a genuine code bug, fix the code; if it reveals a stale/incorrect test expectation, update the test with justification in a comment.

taskTitles: Investigate and fix all failing tests
